title: 服务器报错求解决
author: caiyijiehehe
txt_content:
[20:51:59 WARN]: [AncientGates] The updater could not contact dev.bukkit.org for
 updating.
[20:51:59 WARN]: [AncientGates] If you have not recently modified your configura
tion and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site may be exp
eriencing temporary downtime.
[20:51:59 WARN]: javax.net.ssl.SSLHandshakeException: Remote host closed connect
ion during handshake
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.readRecord(Unknown Sou
rce)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.performInitialHandshak
e(Unknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.startHandshake(Unknown
 Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.startHandshake(Unknown
 Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.afterConnect(U
nknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLCo
nnection.connect(Unknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputS
tream(Unknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.get
InputStream(Unknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at org.mcteam.ancientgates.Updater.read(Updater.java:459
)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at org.mcteam.ancientgates.Updater.access$1(Updater.java
:447)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at org.mcteam.ancientgates.Updater$UpdateRunnable.run(Up
dater.java:497)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]: Caused by: java.io.EOFException: SSL peer shut down incorrectly

[20:51:59 WARN]:        at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.read(Unknown Source)
[20:51:59 WARN]:        ... 12 more
>

replies.author: Wang_Long
replies.txt_content:
[AncientGates]这是个插件 可能是插件导致崩服。你去把它删掉重启试试、
{:10_512:}
